miic.core.stretch_mod.dv_panel_creation¶

dv_panel_creation(dv_list, save_dir='./save')[source]¶

Create pandas.Panel objects recombining corr and dv curves

This function creates two pandas.Panel object recombining respectively all correlation curve and dv/v curve created for a specific dataset and one pandas.DataFrame containing all the metainformation in each stats object associated with one stations pair.

The function accept a list of dv dictionaries that could be created, e.g., with the function velocity_change_estimate() or with multi_ref_vchange_and_align() that are checked for a consistent structure through dv_check().

Patterns that are processed without errors are logged in a file success_patterns.npy saved in the save_dir directory.

Parameters:
  • dv_list (list of dv dictionaries) – List of dv dictionaries
  • save_dir (string) – Where the two Panels and the one DataFrame will be saved
Return type:

dict
Returns:

panel_dict: dictionary that has this structure: dv: Velocity change panel corr: Correlation panel stats: Meta-information stored in a DataFrame
